result.eng: The example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ga: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.orig: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.html: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrthaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ponchtml: Cuideoiḋ na habairtí samplaċa leat na focail a ḟí isteaċ i do ċuid cainte go nádúrṫaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.

result.eng: People who speak Irish, for example you and me.
result.ga: Daoine a bhfuil Gaeilge acu mar shampla tusa agus mise
result.orig: Daoine a bhfuil Gaeilge acu mar shampla tusa agus mise
result.html: Daoine a bhfuil Gaeilge acu mar shampla tusa agus misePeople who speak Irish, for example you and me.
result.ponchtml: Daoine a ḃfuil Gaeilge acu mar ẛampla tusa agus misePeople who speak Irish, for example you and me.

result.eng: It is not a good example.
result.html: Ní sampla maith éIt is not a good example.
result.ponchtml: Ní sampla maiṫ éIt is not a good example.

result.ga: Tíortha Baltacha an Liotuáin cuir i gcás
result.orig: Tíortha Baltacha an Liotuáin cuir i gcás
result.html: Tíortha Baltacha an Liotuáin cuir i gcásBaltic countries, for example Lithuania.
result.ponchtml: Tíorṫa Baltaċa an Liotuáin cuir i gcásBaltic countries, for example Lithuania.

result.eng: This is a good example of what happens when amateurs undertake the research.
result.ga: Seo sampla maith dá dtiteann amach nuair a thugann amaitéaraigh faoin taighde

result.ponchtml: Seo sampla maiṫ dá dtiteann amaċ nuair a ṫugann amaitéaraiġ faoin taiġdeThis is a good example of what happens when amateurs undertake the research.
